content.question: Which of the following can be used to replace /* missing code */ so that the code segment prints the sum of the positive numbers in the file?

choices.label: double temp = fileInput.nextDouble(); if (temp > 0) { sum = sum + temp; }
double temp = fileInput.nextDouble(); if (temp > 0) { sum = sum + fileInput.nextDouble(); }

content.answer: double temp = fileInput.nextDouble(); if (temp > 0) { sum = sum + temp; }

skill.text: 2.C: Write program code involving procedural abstractions.
